dt-api.name: column().columnControl.searchClear()
dt-api.summary: Remove any ColumnControl applied search from the selected column

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the selected column.
type.description: Remove any search that was applied to the column via ColumnControl inputs.

dt-api.description:
ColumnControl's search controls have UI elements that allow the end user to quickly clear a search term, but you might also wish to do this using external controls. This method provides a programmatic way to clear a search term that was added by ColumnControl to a selected column. `-content searchList` and input based search content types (e.g. `-content searchText`) will all be cleared by this method.
Note that the table will not be automatically redrawn when this method has been called. You need to call `-api draw()` to display the changes as a result of the updated search.

example.title: Remove ColumnControl applied search terms from column index 0
